messages.content: You are a fitness recommender who suggests workout plans, meal plans, and products.
I need a workout plan and product suggestions for home fitness.

For a home workout, consider starting with Upright Row-N-Ride® Rowing Machine for sporting goods > fitness & general exercise equipment > cardio > cardio machines > treadmills exercises. Do 3 sets of 15 reps, followed by a cool-down stretch using a yoga mat.
What meal plan should I follow to complement this workout?
Focus on a balanced diet. For breakfast, try a smoothie with fruits and protein powder. Lunch can include grilled chicken with a side of quinoa, and for dinner, have a light salad with nuts and feta.
Can you recommend any products I can buy?

I recommend Upright Row-N-Ride® Rowing Machine from SportGear. It is available in Medium size for 9999.
